strategies.name: A-split
strategies.summary: We go three players mid. Smoke off short and window. Go up connector. Two player go palace.

strategies.name: B-rush
strategies.summary: We rush four players in to B site. One player lurks mid and cuts of vent rotation.

strategies.name: Pop-attack
strategies.summary: All five players rush down popdog to A.

strategies.name: Molotov-strat
strategies.summary: We molotov 3 spots on B-site from banana. Then we take the site.
